name: Ankita Gole
about: She is from Delhi. Her father works as a shopkeeper and her mom as a maid, however, she aspire to become a Software Engineer and make her family proud.
post: Tester and NodeJS developer, SmallWorld Digital Services

name: Anurag Rawat
about: He is from Uttarakhand,Dehradun. His father is a watchmen and the only earning member of his family. In order to support his family's financial needs after completing his class 12th, he  joined Navgurkul and currently working as a python developer in Mahiti Infotech,Bengalore.

name: Jagannath Swarnkar
about: Jagan is from Pilibhit, Uttar Pradesh. He completed his 12th and joined Navgurukul. He started his programming journey at Navgurukul and today he is financially supporting his family. He is working as a full stack web developer at Appscrip, Bengaluru. Currently working with Reactjs, Angularjs, and Nodejs

name: Jai Kishan
about: Jai has passed his 12th and He is from Delhi, now working as a Python developer in Mahiti Infotech, Bangalore. Interested in social welfare and intracting with new peoples.

name: Amar Sinha
about: Amar's dad runs a small shop in Guwahati, making college an unafforable option for him. He joined NavGurukul to learn at his own terms, and is currently a full-stack developer - Javascript, Java and Python being primary language of his interest.

name: Diwakar Prasad
about: Diwakar belongs to a low-income family where his father is the only earning person and drives a car for a private company. He joined Navgurukul after finishing his schooling from a Delhi Government school in August 2017 after struggling a lot to get admission in a good college. Finally, his hard work and dedication paid off and he is now working at MindTree as a software developer.

name: Nitin Gupta
about: Nitin was helping out his father at their recharge shop after finishing his class 12th. Now he works for CodeYug, Delhi as a Software Developer.

name: Annu Bharti
about: Annu hailing from Kishanganj, Bihar is working at Mindtree. Living in a village she barely had access to good education. Now she wishes to establish another Navgurukul in  her own village.

name: Aman Sharma
about: Aman Sharma Completed his 12th from MP(Bord). he started his journey on july 2018 and now he is working in safal solution as a PHP Developer.

name: Kajal Ahirwal
about: Kajal an 18 year old girl, who just finished her tenth class, with less than 6 months of training at Navgurukul - is now working at Mindtree.  Based out of Delhi, her father is a rickshaw puller and mother a domestic cook in Delhi.

name: Sunil
about: Sunil has passed his 12th class last year. He was not able to took admission in collage because of his less marks. Then he joined Navgurukul. Now he is working as a java developer at Safal Solutions, Hyderabad

name: Shivam Raj
about: Shivam (12th pass) was working as a helper at a local bakery and then at a call center. He is now working as a Software Developer at GamingMonk, Delhi.

name: Khushboo Pandit
about: Khushboo was the youngest girl to join NavGurukul (at 16). She is currently working as a react developer but can code full-stack. Her dad works as a cleaner in Gurgaon while she finished her schooling with the help of Neev Foundation.

name: Nitesh Sharma
about: Nitesh completed BCA from Sant Singaji Institute Of Science & Management. Interested in social welfare and solving problems through facilitation and ground-work.

name: Vishal Gaddam
about: Vishal Gaddam completed his graduation in B.Sc.IT from Mumbai University. He joined NavGurukul in June 2018 and now he is  working as Curriculum Designer.

name: Anoop Gupta
about: Anoop Gupta completed his graduation from Kanpur University. he started his journey as a programmer from NavGurukul. He is  working in Repup(Gurgaon) as a Software Developer

name: Rani Pandit
about: Rani is currently working as a React Developer in Gurgaon. Barely 18, Rani's father work as a mason but have always inspired her to work harder towards her aspirations

name: Naresh Kumar Gautam
about: Naresh (10th pass) hails from Delhi and is currently working in Gurgaon. Interested in sports and Art and craft.

name: Savita Verma
about: From Jhunjhunu (Rajasthan), Savita is a fierce debator and a freelance content writer. Savita is quite vocal about gender related issues. Currently, she is also working on outreach at NavGurukul to onboard partners for admission of new students.

name: Rahul Kashyap
about: Rahul Kashyap working in Bsd Technology as a android developer and have great experience in developing mobile application.

name: Shivnath Halder
about: Shivnath has start his carrier at the age of 17 and now he is working in Bsd Technology as a Software developer, moreover he worked with react.

name: Pratyush Kumar
about: Pratyush attended NavGurukul from November 2017 until September 2018. He is now working at MindTree Limited. He has a strong desire to work in rural education in the long-term. Pratyush likes to play cricket and mentors students at NavGurkul in his free time.

name: Deepa Kumari
about: Deepa has passed her 12th and she is from Guwahati, Assam, her father have a small shop and she completed her training in just 7 months. Now working as a Android developer in Mindtree, Bangalore.

name: Pralhad Jadhav
about: A Navgurkul alumnus, Pralhad completed BE from Electronics & Telecommunication engineering stream Graduate in 2017 from Pune Univercity. Now working with Navgurukul as Software Engineer

name: Sonam Kumawat
about: She completed BSc from Vikram university ujjain. right now working as software developer in E-unimart hyderabad.

name: Komal Bhatt
about: Komal has completed 12th. She doesn’t have an interest to join the college that’s why she came to NavGurukul,NavGurkul had become a good opportunity for her because She got to know about herself more and started exploring things in NavGurkul as being the part of the council and visiting places as a manthan opportunity. She is doing an internship in Actyv Company as a web developer

name: Aman Jha
about: He belongs to a low-income family and he has completed Intermediate then joined navgurukul. Now he is working  as a python developer in Bsd technology. Aman likes to play Cricket.

name: Akhil Rawat
about: Akhil comes from Dehradun. He joined NavGurukul after completing his Intermediate Studies. Presently, he is working as a Web Developer in CodeChef.

name: Manoj Kumar
about: Manoj graduated from Delhi University. His father works as a peon. He learnt programming at NavGurukul and now working as a Web Development & Digital Marketing Manager at iDream Education Pvt Ltd. He loves to travel and meet new people.
post: Web Developer, iDream Education Pvt Ltd

name: Aslam
about: Aslam currently works and lives in Delhi. His father works as a rickshaw driver. He is a person who is positive about every aspect of life. He is a software developer who studied from NavGurukul. He is currently a freelancer.

name: Ravina
about: Ravina is from Mohamari, Bihar. Her father works as a farmer. It was very difficult for Ravina to continue her study after completing 12th class due to  lack of money. She chose NavGurukul and is now working as a Backend Developer in Juspay - world’s first mobile payment browser for Secure 1–click experience.

name: Nilam Kumari
about: Nilam belongs to Kishanganj, Bihar. She has done her graduation. Her father works as small farmer. She wants to explore working in technology. Currently she is working as a core team member with NavGurukul.

name: Pooja Saini
about: Pooja is from Delhi. Her mother works as a tailor, after her dad's death her mother was the only person to take care of her family. Pooja has aspiration to do something big is in her life. Currently she is working as a Frontend Developer in SmallWorld Digital Service - software-powered integrated solution that combines technology, analytics & automation to enable brands to improve their own-website revenues.

name: Pavan Vishwakarma
about: Pavan is from MP. His dad works as a carpenter. He also start his career as a carpenter to support his dad. After his education in NavGurukul he is working as Software developer in Mobiroller- self-service mobile app platform that enables anyone to create apps without coding.

name: Pratik Deshmukh
about: Pratik comes from a family which traditionally works into farming in the tribal village of Lobhi, Bhandara district, Maharashtra. His dad works as a sugarcane farmer and mom is a housewife. He has completed class 8th and joined NavGurukul. He works in Auroville with Leap club as a Software Developer.

name: Venu Bhaktpralhad Jibhakate
about: Venu has completed class 12th from Maharashtra. Her father has a small shop. She dropped out from BSc and joined NavGurukul. She felt deeply interested in Frontend Engineering because of her interest in design. Currently, woking as a ReactJs Developer in SmallWorld Digital Service - software-powered integrated solution that combines technology, analytics & automation to enable brands to improve their own-website revenues.
